Summary: Videoing at the Marina beach filed what I thought was a airplane But it was three UFOs
divs: Sighting Details Been videoing the Monterey Bay area for years I have videoed over 20 UFOs and about the same in photos up to this day. Videos are filmed at night.. This video that I'm reporting has not only the typical white colors as orbs but there is this BLUE orb that comes up under a small airplane then moves away about 20 or so feet stops then takes off supper fast. It's a must see video!...At this time I'm not going to show them there under review.
